ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] The End of Elfson
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry to see you go.  Safe travels. Evulia of Tunare Legba Work  cenet.com           cc: Subject:
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry to see you go. Safe travels.

Evulia of Tunare




"Legba Work"
<mattdeba@voi To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
cenet.com> cc:
Subject: [eqbards] The End
11/14/2000 of Elfson
10:03 AM
Please
respond to
eqbards






After 2 semi-retirments, I made it official last night.

The last straw:
Elfson is killed by his own pet. I don't bother petitioning, because I
know
the answer. A long time friend of mine, leaves her camp deep in Karnors to
rez me (at the moat). About an hour later in a amazing heated battle (5
mobs with no enchanter), we somehow prevail (amazing what 6 players who
know
what they're doing can accomplish) and I level to 48. Strangely I really
don't feel very happy.

I switch to Eetbugz (my twink warrior). An iksar maurader flees through a
wall, so I sit down to bring him back to me. He comes back under the
earth,
and kills me befor I can make it to the zone. I petition, and after half
an
hour a guide tells me they will forward my petition to the proper
authorities for investigation.. 90 minutes of saying my goodbyes to my
guild and friends (I tell them I will wait until the day before my next pay
cycle before making it official, giving me time to reconsider). I give up
waiting for my petition and begin to run. A goblin caster agros me through
a wall, and this blue caster kills me before I ever see him.
/q
exit
account
cancel account
enter password
yes I'm sure

I'd like to thank all the bards here for all their help (and for putting up
with me), too many names to name, and I dont want to leave anyone out.
This
has been a fun and informative set of emails for a very long time for me.

Maybe I'll start the "Former Bards of Norrath" guild if Anarchy Online ever
makes it public :-)



Please send submissions for the eqbards newsletter to lol@...
with the subject submissions.
